title: Runecrafting cores

properties.name: description
properties.value: Runecrafting cores are any of the three cores dropped by the golems in the Ruins of Camdozaal. Each core can be imbued at the corresponding Runic altar to create runes and gain Runecraft experience. The amount of runes and experience gained per core is 10 times the amount that would be received per pure or rune essence.

content:
Runecrafting cores are any of the three cores dropped by the golems in the Ruins of Camdozaal. Each core can be imbued at the corresponding Runic altar to create runes and gain Runecraft experience. The amount of runes and experience gained per core is 10 times the amount that would be received per pure or rune essence.

The following cores exist:

  • Mind core dropped by Mind golems.
  • Body core dropped by Body golems.
  • Chaos core dropped by Chaos golems. (members only)
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
'''Runecrafting cores''' are any of the three cores dropped by the [[Golem (Ruins of Camdozaal)|golems]] in the [[Ruins of Camdozaal]]. Each core can be imbued at the corresponding [[Runic altar]] to create [[runes]] and gain [[Runecraft]] [[experience]]. The amount of runes and experience gained per core is 10 times the amount that would be received per [[Pure essence|pure]] or [[Rune essence|rune]] essence.

The following cores exist:
* [[Mind core]] dropped by [[Mind golem]]s.
* [[Body core]] dropped by [[Body golem]]s.
* [[Chaos core]] dropped by [[Chaos golem]]s. (members only)

{{Disambig}}
